statements: DELETE FROM employment_compliance_tracking WHERE employee_id = 101 AND department = 'HR';
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE employee_id = 201 AND compliance_status = 'Pending';

DELETE FROM employment_documents WHERE department = 'IT' AND creation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM compliance_status WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' AND review_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM employment_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract' AND upload_date < '2022-01-01';
